#include<iostream>
#include<limits.h>
using namespace std;

struct C{
    int p;
    int w;
};

int min(int a,int b){
    return a<b?a:b;
}
int main(){
    int T;cin>>T;
    while(T--){
        int E,F,N;
        cin>>E>>F;
        cin>>N;
        C curr[N];
        int M[F-E+1];
        for(int i=0;i<(F-E+1);i++)M[i]=INT_MAX;
        for(int i=0;i<N;i++){
            cin>>curr[i].p>>curr[i].w;
            if(curr[i].w<(F-E+1)) M[curr[i].w]=curr[i].p;
        }        
        for(int i=0;i<(F-E+1);i++){
            if(M[i]==INT_MAX)continue; //ignore
            for(int j=0;j<N;j++){
                if((i+curr[j].w)<(F-E+1)&&(M[i]+curr[j].p)<M[i+curr[j].w])
                    M[i+curr[j].w]=M[i]+curr[j].p;
            }
        }
        if(!(F-E)) cout<<"The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is 0.\n";
        else if(M[F-E]==INT_MAX) 
            cout<<"This is impossible.\n";
        else
            cout<<"The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is "<<M[F-E]<<"."<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
